title: Assignment Hub: Automating Academic Workload Management
description: A comprehensive solution for academic task management and workload visualization leveraging AI and data analytics.

title: Power BI Dashboard Collection
description: A collection of interactive Power BI dashboards and reports created for various projects and work assignments.

title: Job List Scraper: Automated Job Data Collection
description: A Python and Selenium-based tool for scraping job titles, tracking keyword trends, and automating job market analysis from Adventist Health's careers portal.

title: The Tweeter Phone: Twilio + Twitter Connection for posting on X
description: A voice-powered Python app that uses Twilio to receive phone calls, transcribes speech, and posts spoken messages directly to X (Twitter) via the API. Perfect for hands-free microblogging or weirdly charming public announcements.

title: Ions Study Web App
description: An interactive web app for memorizing ions in University (Gen Chem I). Features a clickable periodic table, toggleable names/symbols, and practice tools.

title: Email/Article Summary Digest Automation
description: Automates retrieval, summarization, and daily emailing of tech digests and curated articles using Python, OpenAI, Gmail, and Raindrop.io. Generates an HTML email with categorized summaries, article links, and API usage stats.
